TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(object sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed GiveFeedbackEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub GiveFeedbackEventHandler(sender As Object, e As GiveFeedbackEventArgs)
public delegate void GiveFeedbackEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, GiveFeedbackEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 事件处理程序附加到的对象。

span.span: The object where the event handler is attached.

summary.span: 表示一种方法，该方法将处理进程内拖放操作中的反馈路由事件，例如 。

span.span: Represents a method that will handle the feedback routed event from in-process drag-and-drop operations, for instance .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此委托用于下列附加事件。This delegate is used with the following attached events. - - 此委托也用于基元素上的以下路由事件。This delegate is also used with the following routed events on base elements. 这些路由的事件转发之前列出的附加的事件，以使它们更容易访问中的常规元素模型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - 附加的事件和基元素路由事件共享其事件数据，和的冒泡和隧道的路由事件的版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 路由事件过程，这可能会影响该事件的处理的特征。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅[输入概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md)。For details, see [Input Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview.md). 开始拖放操作时发生附加的事件。The attached event occurs when a drag-and-drop operation is started. 附加的事件允许拖动事件，可以修改鼠标指针以拖放操作期间为用户提供可视反馈的外观的源。The attached event enables the source of a drag event to modify the appearance of the mouse pointer to provide the user with visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
